scripts.mud:up: pnpm recursive exec mud set-version -v canary && pnpm install
scripts.mud:link: pnpm recursive exec mud set-version -l ../../../mud && pnpm install
scripts.dev: pnpm --filter ecs-browser run build && pnpm --filter phaserx run build && run-pty % % pnpm run dev:client % pnpm run dev:contracts % pnpm run dev:upload-map % pnpm run dev:copy-maps % pnpm run dev:create-debug-matches
scripts.dev:upload-map: wait-port localhost:8545 && sleep 70 && pnpm --filter headless-client run upload-map:dev
scripts.dev:copy-maps: wait-port localhost:8545 && sleep 80 && pnpm --filter headless-client run copy-maps:dev
scripts.dev:create-debug-matches: wait-port localhost:8545 && pnpm --filter headless-client run create-debug-matches:dev
